1.0.name: wordpress/bangla-contact-form
1.0.description:
Bangla Contact Form" Creative Bangla Contact Form with attachment support and also include Empty Form validation. after installation then go to your Plugin Editor and findout 'ahrnetwork@gmail.com' and replace it. Now go to addnew page>create new pages>paste this code [contact_form]

Credits

  • Powered by Bangladesh Web Lab Updated for Wordpress 3.3.1

Features: * Simple Contact sytems for Your Wordpress Blog * Bangla(Unicode)Form * Empty Form Javascripts validation

Plugin by Cx Rana. Need a Web Designer?
